
                            
                            <p>2斤，42块。还可以。之前买的，降价了补个仓 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/22/173022gm00pu4300g3pin4.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/22/173022gm00pu4300g3pin4.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/22/173033b3xxxzgjcsn2nfs8.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/22/173033b3xxxzgjcsn2nfs8.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">小龙虾这的东西 就是图一个鲜&nbsp;&nbsp;买预制的不如不吃&nbsp;&nbsp;可以去流量大饭店点38元一小盘 最起码是新鲜的</p><p class="pl">我买过这个其他品牌的虾尾很腥，新鲜的就不会。为什么</p><p class="pl">这个时节吃新鲜的不好吗 你这种还估计是去年的货</p>
